channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
Ok so i am using devolution v7 and i have a minor glitch. When i try to make an object teleport me somewhere it doesn't and all the objects that used to do that don't work anymore. I don't know what i did wrong any help would be appreciated.
Thanks, MrMoney

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @MrMoney MrMoney
item.description:
@MrMoney wrote:

I got it thanks anyways

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Vanack Vanack
item.description:
@Vanack wrote:

There are multiple problems that could have happened.

case 2466:
if(objectX == 3044 && objectY == 3489) { //object 1
teleportToX = 2817;
teleportToY = 3288;
sendMessage("Welcome to the training zone. - By Vanack");
}
if(objectX == 3044 && objectY == 3492) {
teleportToX = 2391;
teleportToY = 5162;
sendMessage("Welcome to Tzhaar! - By Vanack");
}
break;

This is a basic code (Taken from my older version of Vanack X.3). This is a conjoined tele-portal code block. This has 2 teleports together, as it must be this way when using the same portal IP for both of them.

case 8972: // kalphite zone
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage("You teled to the Kalphite Zone , Carefull !");
teleportToX = 3487;
teleportToY = 9493;
heightLevel = 0;
updateRequired = true; 
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

This is a single portal code, using timers, etc.

My guess for what you did, was you removed brackets ( [ { } ] ) etc. or conjoined 2 teleports in an incorrect fashion.

Read full topic
